channel.title: How do i change the starting look? im an idiot
channel.description: i just started private server editing not to long ago and now i want to edit what my starting look is.... i don't know and want to know...

item.title: How do i change the starting look? im an idiot
item.dc:creator: @Ii_1337_iI Ii 1337 iI
item.source: How do i change the starting look? im an idiot

item.title: How do i change the starting look? im an idiot
item.dc:creator: @Speak Speak
item.description:
@Speak wrote:

go to player.java and search for “Giving the player an unique look” and you should see playerEquipment[playerHat]=6109; playerEquipment[playerCape]=2414; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=6107; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=6108; playerEquipment[playerHands]=6110; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6106; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

and change the one or four numbers at the end to the id of the item you want

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the starting look? im an idiot
